import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SectionEstimation1({_data}) { return (
{/* */}
{_data.title}

{_data.subtitle}

{_data.description}

{/* */}
Contact us Now
{ _data.solutions.map((_object, index)=>(
{_object.serial}

)) }
